experiences: Developed a user-friendly website for drug resistance researchers using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, incorporating Bootstrap for responsive design and GitHub for version control.

Implemented Docker containers to streamline the development and deployment processes, collaborating with DevOps and QA teams to integrate SonarQube for code quality checks and Slack for effective team communication.

Designed intuitive navigation maps and user experiences for the website, ensuring seamless integration of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript while using Bootstrap to enhance the interface and Slack for real-time feedback during development.
Managed the institutional CMS to enhance the user experience for UCOL students and staff, utilizing CMS tools and technologies.

Improved the management and preventive maintenance of technological infrastructure by leveraging Linux for system management, Macrium and Rufus for backup and recovery, and Klein Tools for hardware repairs.

Installed and configured internet and Wi-Fi networks, including the setup of routers, access points, and network security measures using Cisco, TP-LINK, and Ubiquiti to ensure reliable and secure connectivity for all users.
Worked as an apprentice in business technical support, using AnyDesk to assist with troubleshooting and resolving issues while gaining experience in customer service and technical problem-solving.
Handled business internet installation, including the setup, configuration, and testing of network infrastructure using Cisco equipment to ensure reliable and high-speed connectivity.
Created network cables, performing tasks such as cutting, stripping, crimping, and testing to ensure reliable data transmission, with support and coordination facilitated through Slack.
